div.p: GEO Academies is a non-profit organization with the mission of breaking the cycle of poverty by providing students and families with access to quality educational options in impoverished neighborhoods. One way GEO Academies does this is by starting, supporting, and managing high-quality charter schools in different areas of the country.

div.h2: GEOâ€™s Flagship School â€“ 21st Century Charter School at Gary

ul.li: 21C represents a distinctive approach to bridging the high-school-to-college gap.
21Câ€™s program is unlike most college-credit programs in three key ways
Between 2015 and 2018, 173 21C graduates earned a cumulative 1720 college credits
